gw.api.iso

Class XPNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.iso.XPNode

  • public class XPNode
extends java.lang.Object
    The XPNode class wraps a DOM and allows XPath retrieval operations to be performed on that DOM. XPNode provides common functionality for the ISOReceiptBase and ISOResponsBase, which each contain an intance of XPNode to represent the xml document sent by ISO.
